entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 11:00 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: S 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 20 February 2023
